alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; North Walton; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 9:38AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Walton County through 930 AM CDT... At 838 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Destin to 8 miles southwest of Santa Rosa Beach to 23 miles west of Panama City Beach. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Liberty, Freeport, Pond Creek, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Portland, Alpine Heights, Villa Tasso, Blue Mountain Beach, De Funiak Spring Airport, Seaside, Rock Hill, Pleasant Ridge, Gulf Pines, Knox Hill, Bunker and New Harmony. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; North Walton; South Walton
